tool_description: Get Company Logo by Domain (e.g. apple.com, www.apple.com/)
name: Company Logos
title: Company Logos

api_list.name: Get Logo
api_list.description: Fetch company logo by providing domain in query params
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://company-logos.p.rapidapi.com/netlfix.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "company-logos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://company-logos.p.rapidapi.com/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "company-logos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
